get_capabilities(self)

Returns the dictionary defining what types can be perceived within which distance.
get_capabilities(self)¶

Returns the dictionary defining what types can be perceived within which distance.

Returns
sense_capabilities: dict

A dictionary with as keys the object types and values the distances.
